workflow-item.name: item7
workflow-item.script: //Auto generated script, cannot be modified ! actionResult = System.getModule("com.vmware.avi").createPoolObj(PoolServers,enablePool,CreateHealthMonitor,poolName,defaultServerPort,loadBalancerAlgo,serverType,lbConsistentHash,lbCustomHeaderName,ServerCloud,Tenant,HealthMonitorName,healthMonitor,Version,activePassiveHM,capacityEstimation,capacityEstimationThresh,cloudConfigCksum,deleteServerRefresh,gracefulDisableTimeout,hostCheckEnabled,lookupServerByName,rewriteHostHeaderServerName,maxConcurrentConnectionsPerServer,domainName,fewestTasksFeedbackDelay,connectionRampDuration,upstreamConnpoolConnIdleTmo,upstreamConnpoolConnLifeTmo,upstreamConnpoolConnMaxReuse,upstreamConnpoolServerMaxCache,requestQueueEnabled,useServicePort,sniEnabled,serverTimeout,enableRealtimeMetrics,statusCode,failActionURL,statusProtocol,failActiontype,aviVroClient,PersistenceProfileRef,ratio,port,addPersistenceProfileRef,tier1_lr) ;

bind.name: lbConsistentHash
bind.description: Consistent hash data for load balancer algorithm type is consistent hash

bind.name: rewriteHostHeaderServerName
bind.description: Add rewrite host header server name

bind.name: maxConcurrentConnectionsPerServer
bind.description: Add max concurrent connections per server

bind.name: statusCode
bind.description: Status code for fail action type of pool

bind.name: failActionURL
bind.description: Redirect url for fail action type of pool

bind.name: statusProtocol
bind.description: Add status protocol for pool fail action

workflow-item.name: item3
workflow-item.script: //Auto generated script, cannot be modified ! actionResult = System.getModule("com.vmware.avi").createVsVIPObj(Tenant,name,IPAddress,eastWestPlacement,aviAllocatedFIp,autoAllocateIp,enabled,autoAllocateFloatingIp,aviAllocatedVip,aviVroClient,tier1,ServerCloud) ;

workflow-item.name: item1
workflow-item.script: //Auto generated script, cannot be modified ! actionResult = System.getModule("com.vmware.avi").createVirtualServiceObj(Name,poolgroupName,ServerCloud,Tenant,ApplicationProfile,servicePort,SSLCertificate,SSLCert,CertName,CreateSSL,serviceEngine,poolOrPoolgroup,poolName,vsVIP,existingVIP,allowInvalidClientCert,closeClientConfigUpdate,description,enableAutogw,enableRhi,enableRhiSnat,ignPoolNetReach,removeListeningPortOnVsDown,scaleoutEcmp,clientIpAddr,includeURL,excludeURL,addClientLogFliter,enabledClientLog,clientStringRef,clientDuration,logAllClientHeaders,analyticsProfile,clientInsights,significantLogThrottle,udfLogThrottle,nonSignificantLogs,nslduration,nslThrottle,metricsRealtimeUpdate,metricsRealtimeUpdateDuration,maxCpsPerClient,trafficEnabled,useBridgeIpAsVip,useVipAsSnat,vsVipName,aviVroClient,network_profile) ;

bind.name: CreateSSL
bind.description: Check create SSL certificate or not

bind.name: closeClientConfigUpdate
bind.description: Add close client connection on config update

bind.name: ignPoolNetReach
bind.description: Ignore network reachability constraints for the server pool

bind.name: removeListeningPortOnVsDown
bind.description: Remove listening port if VirtualService is down

bind.name: scaleoutEcmp
bind.description: Disable re-distribution of flows across service engines for a virtual service

bind.name: includeURL
bind.description: Add include URL for client log

bind.name: excludeURL
bind.description: Add exclude URL for client log

bind.name: addClientLogFliter
bind.description: Checkbox for add client log fliter

bind.name: clientStringRef
bind.description: Add string referencce for client log

bind.name: logAllClientHeaders
bind.description: Checkbox for enabled all log headers

bind.name: clientInsights
bind.description: Add client insights for analytics profile logs

bind.name: maxCpsPerClient
bind.description: Maximum connections per second per client IP

bind.name: useVipAsSnat
bind.description: Use the Virtual IP as the SNAT IP for health monitoring

workflow-item.name: item11
workflow-item.script: //Auto generated script, cannot be modified ! actionResult = System.getModule("com.vmware.avi").createSSLCertificateObj(aviVroClient,SSLAlgorithm,CommonName,RSAKeySize,ECKeySize,certificateBase,CertName,emailAddress,organizationUnit,organization,locality,state,country,distinguishedName) ;

bind.name: CommonName
bind.description: Common name for SSL certificate description

bind.name: certificateBase
bind.description: States if the certificate is base64 encoded.

p-param.name: lb_algorithm
p-param.p-qual: #{#string#Least Connections#;#string#Round Robin#;#string#Least Load#;#string#Fewest Servers#;#string#Consistent Hash#;#string#Fastest Response#;#string#Core Affinity#}#

p-param.name: lb_consistent_hash
p-param.p-qual: #{#string#Source IP Address #;#string#Source IP Address And Port #;#string#Callid#;#string#URI #;#string#Custom String#;#string#Custom Header#}#
